Body:
self.model = CrossEntropyMNL(solver='lbfgs', fit_intercept=True, est_stderr
    =True, reg_method='l2', alpha=0, l1_ratio=0, tol=0.0001, max_iter=100,
    coef=None, stderr=None, n_classes=None)
len_half = 500
self.model.fit(self.data_anes96.exog, self.y_disturbed, sample_weight=np.
    array([1] * len_half + [0] * (self.data_anes96.exog.shape[0] - len_half)))
self.model_half = CrossEntropyMNL(solver='lbfgs', fit_intercept=True,
    est_stderr=True, reg_method='l2', alpha=0, l1_ratio=0, tol=0.0001,
    max_iter=100, coef=None, stderr=None, n_classes=None)
self.model_half.fit(self.data_anes96.exog[:len_half], self.y_disturbed[:
    len_half])
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.coef, self.model_half.coef,
    decimal=3)
